short CV

Employment:

  • Current position: Research Associate in Statistics, University of Glasgow and the Closed-Loop Data Science projects (from June 2020)
  • Research Assistant in Statistics, University of Glasgow and SofTMech (May 2018 – May 2020)
  • Ph.D. Candidate in Econometrics, Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam and Tinbergen Institute (Sep. 2015 – Aug. 2018)
  • Teaching Assistant for postgraduate courses, Erasmus University Rotterdam (Sep. 2014 – Dec. 2014)

Education:

  • Ph.D. in Econometrics, Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam and Tinbergen Institute, 2019. Supervisors: Siem Jan Koopman and Lennart Hoogerheide

  • M.Phil. in Econometrics, Tinbergen Institute, 2015.

  • B.Sc. in Mathematics (minor: Probability Theory), Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics, and Mechanics, University of Warsaw, 2013.

  • M.Sc. in Economics, Warsaw School of Economics, 2012.

  • B.Sc. in Economics, Warsaw School of Economics, 2009.

Visits and exchanges:

  • University of Edinburgh, School of Mathematics, host supervisor: Ruth King, Apr. – Jun. 2017.
  • University of Göttingen, Faculty of Economics and Business Administration, M.Sc. program, Erasmus exchange, Sep. 2010 – Feb. 2011

Pronunciation

In case you were interested, here is how my name is pronounced: a’gɲɛʂka or Ag-niesh-ka.
